backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user-specific state for tasks, goals, calendar, budget, profiles, and crypto, with access control and CRUD entry points.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding an empty crypto portfolio map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application root configuring TanStack Router, React Query, theming, routes, and global error UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading and retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Route guard enforcing authentication and profile setup before rendering protected routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserProfile: Form for entering and saving a user's name using a profile mutation with basic validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/budget/BudgetIte: Dialog for creating or editing budget items, handling amount, description, date, and type with validation and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/budget/BudgetSum: Displays monthly income, expenses, and net balance using computed totals from budget items.
frontend/src/components/calendar/Calenda: Dialog for creating or editing calendar events, managing title, description, date, and time fields with validation and mutations.
Lists calendar events with sorting, edit/delete actions, empty-state examples, and a form dialog for editing entries.
frontend/src/components/common/Integrity: Shows a destructive alert banner displaying an integrity warning message.
frontend/src/components/common/PrivacySt: Displays a security status bar showing whether the user is authenticated via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionEx: Renders a card listing example templates for a given section with titles and optional descriptions.
frontend/src/components/common/SecurityN: Displays a small alert noting that entries are protected with encryption and require secure login.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoEnt: Dialog for adding or editing crypto portfolio positions with validation and create/update mutations.
Renders a list of crypto positions with value calculations, edit and delete actions, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoSum: Computes and displays total positions, unique assets, and total portfolio value in summary cards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Aggregates and displays summary blocks for tasks, goals, calendar, and budget based on user preferences.
Provides UI controls to enable/disable dashboard sections and select summary modes for each.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Sectio: Reusable summary block showing stats, loading placeholders, or empty messages with an icon.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalFormDi: Modal form for creating or editing goals, handling input state, validation, and submit mutations.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalList.t: Displays goals with progress controls, edit/delete actions, and loading/empty states with examples.
Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, footer, and outlet rendering based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Modal form for creating or editing tasks, handling description, optional due date, and submitting mutations.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Displays task list with completion toggles, edit/delete actions, empty-state examples, and opens the task form dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/budget/useBudget.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on budget items via the actor API.
React Query hooks to fetch and manage calendar entries including create, update, and delete.
frontend/src/hooks/crypto/useCrypto.ts: Provides React Query hooks for managing crypto portfolio entries with CRUD mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/dashboard/useDashboar: Manages dashboard summary preferences with localStorage persistence and section/mode toggles.
frontend/src/hooks/goals/useGoals.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating goals, including progress updates and deletion.
frontend/src/hooks/integrity/useIntegrit: Stub integrity-check hook that always reports no issues while preparing for future digest-based verification.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks/useTasks.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating task data through the actor API, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for login, logout, and identity restoration using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes React Query hooks for loading and saving the caller's user profile with automatic cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, and component styles including light/dark themes and custom UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPage.tsx: Renders the budget management interface with item listing, creation/editing dialogs, integrity checks, and summary components.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Displays calendar entries with integrity warnings, listing, and dialog-based event creation.
frontend/src/pages/CryptoPage.tsx: Shows crypto portfolio data with summary, list, and dialog to add positions, styled with a crypto theme.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard view fetching tasks, goals, calendar, and budget data, rendering summaries and quick-access cards.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsPage.tsx: Page for viewing and managing goals with integrity checks, list display, and goal creation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Page for listing and creating tasks with integrity verification and a task form dialog.
frontend/src/utils/dashboard/summaryComp: Provides functions to compute summary stats for tasks, goals, calendar entries, and budget items based on selected mode.
frontend/src/utils/integrity/canonicaliz: Converts tasks, goals, calendar entries, and budget items into canonical JSON strings for integrity checking.
frontend/src/utils/integrity/salts.ts: Manages per-user salted values in localStorage for integrity hashing, including generation and clearing.
frontend/src/utils/integrity/sha256.ts: Computes SHA-256 digests of strings using Web Crypto API.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, emphasizing a shift to a mobile-first organizer with privacy, UI theming, and new tracking areas, plus known issues and a list of implemented features. Includes architectural notes on security and design direction.
